org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.tigr.tasm

Class TasmContigBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.AbstractContigBuilder<TasmAssembledRead,TasmContig>
      • org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.tigr.tasm.TasmContigBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContigBuilder<TasmAssembledRead,TasmContig>, Builder<TasmContig>

    public final class TasmContigBuilder
extends AbstractContigBuilder<TasmAssembledRead,TasmContig>
    Builder for TasmContigs that allows creating TasmContig objects read by read by adding assembled reads and setting a consensus. An TasmContigBuilder can be used to create TasmContigs that have been created by an assembler or can be used to create contigs from "scratch". There are additional methods to allow the contig consensus or underlying reads to be modified before the creation of the TasmContig instance (which is immutable).
    Author:
    dkatzel

    • Constructor Detail

      • TasmContigBuilder

        public TasmContigBuilder(String id,
                         NucleotideSequence consensus)
        Create a new TasmContigBuilder instance setting the contig id and contig consensus. If the contig id is a positive numeric, then the TigrProjectAssemblyId will also be set to the contig id. This can be changed by calling setTigrProjectAssemblyId(Long). All other TasmContig optional specific attributes will be set to the default values of null or false.
        Parameters:
        id - the contig id; can not be null.
        consensus - the contig consensus; can not be null.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either id or consensus are null.

      • TasmContigBuilder

        public TasmContigBuilder(Contig<? extends AssembledRead> copy)
        Create a new TasmContigBuilder instance setting the initial contig state to have the same contig, id, and underlying reads as the given contig. If the contig id is a positive numeric, then the TigrProjectAssemblyId will also be set to the contig id. This can be changed by calling setTigrProjectAssemblyId(Long). All other TasmContig optional specific attributes will be set to the default values of null or false.
        Parameters:
        copy - the contig to copy; can not be null.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if copy is null.

      • TasmContigBuilder

        public TasmContigBuilder(TasmContig copy)
        Create a new Builder instance with the initial state of a copy of the given TasmContig. The contig id, consensus, underlying reads and all tasm specific attributes will be identical to the values of the input TasmContig. These initial values may be changed by the mutator methods of this class.
        Parameters:
        copy - the TasmContig to copy; can not be null.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if copy is null.

      • getAllAssembledReadBuilders

        public Collection<TasmAssembledReadBuilder> getAllAssembledReadBuilders()
        Description copied from class: AbstractContigBuilder
        Get a collection of all the AssembledReadBuilders that are currently associated with this contig. This collection is backed by the contig builder so any changes to the returned collection or modifications to any of its AssembledReadBuilders will modify the contig as well.
        Specified by:
        getAllAssembledReadBuilders in interface ContigBuilder<TasmAssembledRead,TasmContig>
        Overrides:
        getAllAssembledReadBuilders in class AbstractContigBuilder<TasmAssembledRead,TasmContig>
        Returns:
        a a collection of all the AssembledReadBuilder that are currently associated with this contig; never null.

      • getAssembledReadBuilder

        public TasmAssembledReadBuilder getAssembledReadBuilder(String readId)
        Description copied from class: AbstractContigBuilder
        Get the AssembledReadBuilder for the read in this contig with the given read id. Any changes to the returned instance will modify that read in this contig.
        Specified by:
        getAssembledReadBuilder in interface ContigBuilder<TasmAssembledRead,TasmContig>
        Overrides:
        getAssembledReadBuilder in class AbstractContigBuilder<TasmAssembledRead,TasmContig>
        Parameters:
        readId - the id of the read to get.
        Returns:
        a AssembledReadBuilder, will return null if no read with that id currently exists for this contig.

      • withComment

        public TasmContigBuilder withComment(String comment)
        Sets the comment attribute for this adapted contig. Calling this method multiple times will overwrite previous entries with the current entry. Setting the value to null will remove the current entry (the type can later be re-added by calling this method again with a non-null value).
        Parameters:
        comment - the value of the comment to set; if this value is null, then the contig should not have this attribute.
        Returns:
        this.

        Returns:
        this.

      • setCoverageInfo

        public TasmContigBuilder setCoverageInfo(Integer numberOfReads,
                                         Double avgCoverage)
        Sets the number of reads and avg coverage attributes for this contig. If these values are not set, or set to null, then the values will be computed by counting the bases in the underlying reads. Calling this method multiple times will overwrite previous entries with the current entry. Setting the values to null will remove the current entries (and can later be re-added by calling this method again with a non-null values).
        Parameters:
        numberOfReads - the value to set as the number of reads regardless of what the actual underlying read count is.
        avgCoverage - the value to set as the average coverage regardless of what the actual underlying reads are.
        Returns:
        this.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if avgCoverage < 0

      • withCeleraAssemblerContigId

        public TasmContigBuilder withCeleraAssemblerContigId(Long caId)
        Sets the Celeara Assembler UID attribute for this adapted contig. Calling this method multiple times will overwrite previous entries with the current entry. Setting the value to null will remove the current entry (the type can later be re-added by calling this method again with a non-null value). As of 2006, All contigs should get a CA Contig Id set to a UID.
        Parameters:
        caId - the value of the Celera Assembler Contig Id to set; if this value is null, then the contig should not have this attribute.
        Returns:
        this.

      • setSampleId

        public TasmContigBuilder setSampleId(String sampleId)
        Sets the bac_id attribute for this adapted contig. Calling this method multiple times will overwrite previous entries with the current entry. Setting the value to null will remove the current entry (the type can later be re-added by calling this method again with a non-null value).
        Parameters:
        sampleId - the value of the sample id to set; may be null if this contig does not have a sample id.
        Returns:
        this.

Setting the value to null will remove the current entry (the method can later be re-added by calling this method again with a non-null value).
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • withEditInfo

        public TasmContigBuilder withEditInfo(String editPerson,
                                      Date editDate)
        Sets the edit person and edit date attributes for this contig. Calling this method multiple times will overwrite previous entries with the current entries. Setting EITHER value to null will remove the current entries (the attributes can later be re-added by calling this method again with a non-null values).
        Parameters:
        editPerson - the person who last made an edit to this contig.
        editDate - the date that this contig was last edited (by the editPerson)
        Returns:
        this.

      • build

        public org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.tigr.tasm.TasmContigBuilder.DefaultTasmContig build()
        Description copied from class: AbstractContigBuilder
        Create a new instance using the data collected by this builder thus far.

        Take the current read and consensus data (which has possibly been previous edited and/or shifted) and create a new AceContig instance. Calling this method might release resources or destroy temp data that is required to built this contig, therefore this method should be only called once per builder instance. If this method is called more than once, then an IllegalStateException will be thrown.

        Specified by:
        build in interface ContigBuilder<TasmAssembledRead,TasmContig>
        Specified by:
        build in interface Builder<TasmContig>
        Specified by:
        build in class AbstractContigBuilder<TasmAssembledRead,TasmContig>
        Returns:
        a new AceContig instance, never null.
